Class tripleplay.util.StyledText

Removed Constructors
StyledText()  
 

Removed Methods
CanvasImage toImage() Creates an image large enough to accommodate this styled text, and renders it therein.
ImageLayer toLayer() Creates an image large enough to accommodate this styled text, renders it therein and returns an image layer with its translation adjusted per the effect renderer.
 

Added Methods
Canvas toCanvas() Creates a canvas large enough to accommodate this styled text, and renders it therein.
ImageLayer toLayer(ImageLayer) Creates an image large enough to accommodate this styled text, renders it therein and applies it to {@code layer}, adjusting its translation per the effect renderer.
ImageLayer toLayer() Creates an image large enough to accommodate this styled text, renders it therein and returns an image layer with its translation adjusted per the effect renderer.
 

Changed Methods
Block block(Graphics, String, TextStyle, float) Change in signature from (String, TextStyle, float) to (Graphics, String, TextStyle, float).
 Creates a uniformly formatted multiple-lines of text wrapped at {@code wrapWidth} and left-aligned.
Span span(Graphics, String, TextStyle) Change in signature from (String, TextStyle) to (Graphics, String, TextStyle).
 Creates a uniformly formatted single-line of text.
